author: Ashley Carman
title: Instagram pop-up experiences lay off employees as the business tanks
description: Museum of Ice Cream and Color Factory are two photogenic pop-ups that have closed their doors for the foreseeable future as the COVID-19 pandemic continues. Both companies have had to lay off their staff and reduce salaries for those who remain.
content:
Museum of Ice Cream and Color Factory are closed for now
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
Color Factory CEO Jeff Lind knew his Instagram pop-up experience had to close when the NBA canceled the remainder of its season. He was watching the Utah Ja… [+9363 chars]
